channel.title: [1.6.2] TSherriff PVP & Factions [32GB RAM]
channel.description:
TSherriff PvP Factions Server [NEW!]
We are a community driven factions based PvP server. We feel that is important to listen to what the players want, and many of the features you will find on our server are completely unique and based on player feedback.
Unlike a lot of other Minecraft servers, we do not use a standard Minecraft hosting company. All of our servers are run on completely dedicated hardware to ensure maximum flexibility, uptime and a lag-free environment for our players.
TSherriff MC runs on the following hardware:
Intel速 Xeon速 Processor E3-1290V2 32GB ECC RAM 1 Gbps dedicated network connection Solid state drives to speed data loads Daily backups of world + plugin data
Features:
Faction server Unique donator ranks Mineable spawners Buy most if not everything @ shops Unprotected chest Player Shops for donators Arenas - MobArena, FFA, PVP!
Plugins:
Factions - Includes custom commands such as /fchat ally/faction/public mcMMO - Completely rebalanced, no more overpowered skills or abilities ObbyDestroyer - Obsidian breaks from 15 direct hits from TNT Spawner - Mineable spawners using silk touch available to donators only

item.title: [1.6.2] TSherriff PVP & Factions [32GB RAM]
item.dc:creator: @nadad0r11 nadad0r11
item.description:
@nadad0r11 wrote:

TSherriff PvP Factions Server [NEW!]

We are a community driven factions based PvP server. We feel that is important to listen to what the players want, and many of the features you will find on our server are completely unique and based on player feedback.

Unlike a lot of other Minecraft servers, we do not use a standard Minecraft hosting company. All of our servers are run on completely dedicated hardware to ensure maximum flexibility, uptime and a lag-free environment for our players.

TSherriff MC runs on the following hardware:

Intel速 Xeon速 Processor E3-1290V2
32GB ECC RAM
1 Gbps dedicated network connection
Solid state drives to speed data loads
Daily backups of world + plugin data

Features:

Faction server
Unique donator ranks
Mineable spawners
Buy most if not everything @ shops
Unprotected chest
Player Shops for donators
Arenas - MobArena, FFA, PVP!

Plugins:

Factions - Includes custom commands such as /fchat ally/faction/public
mcMMO - Completely rebalanced, no more overpowered skills or abilities
ObbyDestroyer - Obsidian breaks from 15 direct hits from TNT
Spawner - Mineable spawners using silk touch available to donators only
